statements: SELECT * FROM MedicationUsage ORDER BY patient_id ASC, usage_date DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM MedicationUsage WHERE adherence_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, usage_date FROM MedicationUsage WHERE dosage BETWEEN 5.0 AND 10.0;
SELECT * FROM MedicationUsage WHERE patient_id = 123 AND adherence_rating = 5;
SELECT medication_name, AVG(dosage) AS avg_dosage FROM MedicationUsage GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT * FROM MedicationUsage WHERE adherence_rating > 3 ORDER BY usage_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_rating FROM MedicationUsage WHERE dosage >= 5 ORDER BY adherence_rating DESC, usage_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT medication_name FROM MedicationUsage WHERE patient_id = 12345;
SELECT AVG(dosage) as average_dosage, MIN(dosage) as min_dosage, MAX(dosage) as max_dosage FROM MedicationUsage GROUP BY medication_name;
SELECT patient_id, COUNT(*) as total_usage_count FROM MedicationUsage GROUP BY patient_id HAVING total_usage_count >= 3 ORDER BY total_usage_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE age < 50;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication_name FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Medications m ON p.patient_id = m.medication_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(age) AS max_age FROM Patients GROUP BY patient_name ORDER BY max_age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, dosage, timestamp FROM medication_history;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, condition FROM patient_details;
SELECT patient_id, medication_name, adherence_status FROM adherence_data;
SELECT patient_name, age, condition, gender, patient_id FROM patient_details;
SELECT medication_name, patient_id, adherence_status, feedback FROM adherence_data;
SELECT * FROM medication_history LIMIT 5;
SELECT medication_name, dosage, timestamp FROM medication_history WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender, condition FROM patient_details WHERE age > 30 AND condition = 'Diabetes' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients, condition FROM patient_details GROUP BY condition;
SELECT medication_name, adherence_status FROM adherence_data WHERE adherence_status IN ('High', 'Medium') AND feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY medication_name ASC, adherence_status DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg';
SELECT patient_id, name, gender FROM patients WHERE age >= 50;
SELECT prescription_id, prescribing_physician, prescription_date FROM prescriptions ORDER BY prescription_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications ORDER BY medication_name DESC;
SELECT p.name, m.medication_name, pr.prescribing_physician FROM prescriptions pr JOIN patients p ON pr.patient_id = p.patient_id JOIN medications m ON pr.medication_id = m.medication_id;

SELECT p.name, a.adherence_status, a.adherence_date FROM patients p JOIN prescriptions pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN adherence_logs a ON pr.prescription_id = a.prescription_id WHERE p.age > 40;
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT name, age FROM patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT medication.name, medication.dosage FROM medication WHERE usage_interval = 'daily';
SELECT p.name, d.specialty FROM patient p JOIN doctor d ON p.age >= 50 AND p.patient_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT log_id, dosage_taken, adherence_status FROM medication_log WHERE adherence_status = 'Not Adherent';
SELECT * FROM patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM patient WHERE age > 50;

SELECT prescription.prescribe_date, patient.name, medication.name FROM prescription JOIN patient ON prescription.patient_id = patient.patient_id JOIN medication ON prescription.medication_id = medication.medication_id;
SELECT DISTINCT doctor.name, doctor.specialty FROM doctor JOIN prescription ON doctor.name = prescription.doctor;

SELECT patient.name, medication.name, prescription.prescribe_date, medication_log.dosage_taken FROM patient JOIN prescription ON patient.patient_id = prescription.patient_id JOIN medication ON prescription.medication_id = medication.medication_id JOIN medication_log ON prescription.prescription_id = medication_log.log_id WHERE medication_log.adherence_status = 'Completed';
